job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongSoftware Engineer Platform Application Developer strongppstrongCompanystrong Rhove httpsrhovecom  ppbrppstrongJob Descriptionstrong ppRhove is seeking a software engineer interested in building our core products platform Rhove engineers are part of a fastmoving startup building an impactful product and supporting each other on the job Software engineers who love shipping meaningful code weekly ramping up on something new and having an outsized impact are encouraged to apply ppbrppstrongAbout Rhove strongppDemocracy is strongest when everyone has ownership Rhove is a venturebacked Fintech startup thats removing barriers and creating access so that anyone can invest in the places they love most Our mission is to democratize real estate investing so that anyone can experience ownership ppbrppstrongJob Responsibilities strongppYou will be responsible for architecting developing testing and deploying platform application code to support Rhoves mission A strong ability to communicate with team members to identify technical tradeoffs and problemsolve for short timelines is crucial Job responsibilities include but are not limited to the following pulliCollaborate with product and business teams to define features balancing functionality with time to market liliDesign scalability solutions that are the right fit for our domain and load expectations Learn our business and help align technology innovation with our customer needs liliCollaborate with other team members and stakeholders liulpMust be located in or willing to relocate to Columbus OH ppAt this time we do not sponsor H1B visas ppbrppstrongDesired Skills and Experiencestrong pulliWere looking for someone with experience in a mixture of the following technologies lili2 Years Experience in software development Experience with backend frameworks eg Spring NET Django etc liliREST API design and development liliExperience with Relational Database liliAWS Cloud services usage  eg Lambda S3 SQS Fargate DynamoDB etc liulpbrppstrongBenefits strongpulliEmployerpaid healthcare plan for you and your family liliEmployercontributed Health Savings Account Dental vision basic life insurance liliShort term and Long term disability insurance liliGenerous PTO liliEquity stock option plan liulpbrppstrongCore Values strongpulliAuthenticity  We are honest open ethical and fair People trust us to adhere to our word liliCuriosity amp Creativity  We embrace reason and the scientific method Curiosity drives creativity We continuously learn from others and the world ask interesting questions test our hypotheses make conclusions and apply knowledge We take risks develop and apply good judgment cultivate our own voice and celebrate the expression of others liliRemarkable  We solve hard problems We take moon shots and swing for the fences We operate in the realm of the adjacent possible liliDiversity amp Inclusion  We embrace people with dignity and respect regardless of their background race ethnicity age gender disability belief system nationality or sexual orientation We foster the appreciation of and seek to engage different perspectives and ideas liliDeliberate  We are purposedriven We act with intention We are organized and timely Our actions are considerate of the best interests of our team members customers stakeholders investors the market and ourselves liliAutonomy amp Responsibility  We hold ourselves and each other accountable to the highest standards We are proactive and dependable We have a high tolerance for disciplined experimentation and failure but no tolerance for incompetenceliliGrit amp Resilience  We overcome challenges We operate with courage resolve and strength of character We make mistakes learn from them and break through liliPride amp Swagger  We take pride in our work and ourselves We put in the extra effort walk the walk deliver and win We understand our limitations overcome them and strive for greatness We bring our best selves and contribute to the success of our team customers and stakeholders liliFulfillment  We are content Our work is meaningful challenging and makes a positive difference Our collaboration contributes to the happiness and wellbeing of our team and families liliCraftsmanship  We value the quality in our work that comes from creating with passion care and attention to detailliul
